experience.description:
Working as a full-stack developer sure, working with ReactJs, Laravel, WordPress, HTML, CSS, JS. I'm also looking for a working remote team to join.
 My cost: $15 /hr
Working as a web developer, working with VueJs, Laravel, and WordPress.

Working as a web developer, research, training and development the company's core base on WordPress, Laravel, server manager, environment preparing for website product. 
 In this company, I also work with Beautheme, who create beautiful WordPress themes and sold it on Themeforest.
Research coding & making a B2B social network, optimize keywords to top google.
Develop the company's product, work with Joomla 1.5.x, WordPress, I become a web developer from there.
